content.detailedDescription: Sept. 8, 2011, approximately 8:25 am.  i was waiting with my 9-year-old daughter at the bus stop.  we were sitting in our van with the windows down.  the sky was clear and blue and i noticed something coming from the south.  it was a bright, white-silver color.  it would reflect sunlight from time to time.  i watched as it grew nearer and could not see any wings or a vapor trail.  i did not hear any engine noise.  i pointed it out to my daughter and asked her what she thought it looked like (without telling her what i thought i saw) and she said it looked like a "pill".  i then asked her if she saw any wings and she said "no".  then she said maybe it was a blimp.  i told her it was going too fast to be a blimp.  we watched as it glided almost directly over us and then i looked to the south again and saw another one, exactly the same, at what i judged to be the same altitude.  my daughter's bus arrived and so i went up the street, parked the van and went to look at these things some more.  i could see the two objects still gliding toward the ne from the south.  i then noticed another one of the objects gliding in from the sw and heading toward the other two objects.  i kept watching as they went further ne then saw a couple more join up in the "procession".  the last two came in from the west.  they were all headed the same direction which was ne.  i did not hear any sound at all.  i then heard an airplane coming from the south.  from what i could tell it was at roughly the same altitude as the objects (although it's difficult for me to know since there were no wings on the objects so i could not know its true size).  i could easily see the planes wings.  it was a very dark colored plane and it was not shiny, but rather dull looking.  if i had to guess i'd say it was military. it continued to fly ne.  i looked back to where i had last seen the objects and some had already disappeared into the distance, but i was able to see the last couple of them fade off as they got further away.  i stood outside staring up into the sky for a good 20 minutes to see if i could see more.  my neighbor was outside so i told him what i had seen and we tried to come up with reasonable explanations, but really couldn't.  i stayed outside for a bit longer and was able to see a southwest airline plane fly overhead (we live about a 35-minute drive from rdu airport).  i could clearly see its wings and the colors and hear its engines. seeing those objects was very interesting, yet made me feel a bit strange because i could not come up with a good explanation for them.  i know that commercial aircraft don't all fly at the same altitude when they are in the same airspace, so these objects were not commercial aircraft.  we have helicopters fly over our house often, and they are loud and you can see they are helicopters.  these things were not helicopters.  we also live within a 2 or 3 hour drive of some military bases, and often have big military planes and helicopters fly over us.  these objects were not like any of the military things i've seen before.  i am just hoping that someone else, aside from me and my daughter, saw these things so that i know i am not going crazy.
content.summary: Bright, white-silver gelcap shaped objects that glided silently over my neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to a friends house when i looked up at the sky, which i'm always doing, and the very first place i looked they just appeared out of thin air. i remember thinking to myself why nobody else saw what i saw. there were others round but nobody seemed to notice even when i pointed it out to a couple walking in the opposite direction. the first thing i noticed when i saw them was that all three appeared at the same time. they were all the same size and when they first appeared they big enough to hold a quarter up to. they were all the same colour. it was a very bright yellow or gold that had no illuminated qualities about it. they were coming close to me then far away agin and seemed to have no flight plan. they almost seemed like they were having fun. i could see them so clearly because the sun wasn't down yet but it also wasn't all the way up anymore. it was pretty cloudless as well. when i saw the object my first feeling was of a benevolent nature. i felt warm and comfortable. excited and adventurous. it was amazing that i was getting to be a part of this sighting. the object seemed to fly into or through something i couldn't see at one point. i figured this because they seemed to warp or bend and expand with the air. it was a sight to behold. i immediately came to the conclusion that what i am seeing is non other than an extra terrestrial craft hard at work or just plain around. the three object took up a triangular formation then an odd looking bending light came out of all three on the furthest part from the inner triangle formation. these lights were just plain odd. they were very thick and oddly colored. they seemed to do something to the air around the crafts. when ever the craft moved the light moved with as if it were a rope hanging off the side of the craft. the light also distorted or bent the air or space around the objects until they were covered by the off looking air around them then a sudden red streak flew across the sky directly into the object and the objects, lights, and red streak all just disappeared. once they were gone my happy feeling suddenly turned sour and i felt very angry and walked home completely forgetting to go to my friends house.
content.summary: Walking down the street to a friends saw the object and remembered as much as possible

content.detailedDescription: I went outside around 10pm to let the dogs out before retiring to bed and one of my dogs would not get off the front porch. she ran to the left of the porch and growled. i took the dogs back inside and decided 15 mins later i would go out one more time. i went out to the front porch and stood watching the skies and as i was going back inside i heard to my left something running at a high rate of speed sounding similar to running across plastic.I looked around and saw 2 beings which my first instinct was dogs. the more i looked i realized that 1 was black in color and the other was a white/ gray color.They only had 2 legs each so i knew it was no animal.They stopped at the end of my driveway and the white/gray turned around and looked right at me for a second and then they both ran at a high rate of speed and vanished.I do not believe in aliens but i do not know what these things were.I am still shocked and stunned and a little frightened by this.I went inside scared and looked out the windows and saw a light hovering above the trees so i ran and got my camera and video taped what i saw. there was a light above the trees blinking red and white and then it would go out. i taped this for about 3to 5 mins.There was 2 lights above and 2 lights below it. i am attaching the video and hope it can be seen clear.
content.summary: I saw 2 beings run and stop and a white and red light at a distance

content.detailedDescription: I held my phone to the airplane window and pushed record, never got a chance to see with my own eyes, but when i reviewed it i was truly amazed! i think the video pretty much speaks for itself!
content.summary: I video taped 2 bright lights flying by plane with mith my camera phone,

content.detailedDescription:
This is a follow up from a previous report where drawings were provided.  i managed to get video of the brightest light that appears in the eastern sky above roswell and it has been changing locations more frequently.  before it was stationary in the east in a location approximately 70 degrees from horizon and later would be 90 degrees (around 2-3 am).

lately it has been very low (about 30 degrees) and remains stationary; three to four hours later is at 70 degrees, and by 4 am is at 90 degrees and much brighter and appears larger.  it has also migrated to the south and there have been three other very bright lights appear in an arc formation in the brightest one's original location.  formation is at 25, 50, and 75 degrees with pulsating lights flashing red, green, blue.  they all appear the same through binoculars.  

attached video is of the brightest one in the eastern sky on september 5, 2011 at approximately 10:30 pm.
content.summary: Bright pulsing lights every night.  this is a follow up with videos from previous report.

content.detailedDescription:
Object seen while traveling west on highway 195, east of exit 22 over a housing development named the plantation.  it was a grey day with possible rain but the ceiling was high with no visible clouds. the object was noticed first by my father and myself.  it looked like a classic diamond shaped kite black in color but a very very high altitude.  we knew there wasn't an open area large enough to fly a kite so high except maybe this new housing development. so being curious and objectively scientific with an explanation as to where this could be from. my father exited the highway which was our turnoff to go home anyway. at this time the rest of my family in our vehicle were watching the object. my mother, sister, brother,aunt and cousin were present.  the housing development turned out to be empty and not open enough to fly a kite.  we stopped to watch and try to figure out where this apparent kite was being flown from. while watching, the object started to move around almost instantly from point to point. it was very very fast. the distance of travel was at least a hundred yards in any given direction with no clear path. each movement was within a several hundred yard radius. this lasted a minute or two then its altitude dropped by about half and the object started to change shape. it changed several times into several different shapes while continuing to move around in the same radius. shapes were the kite diamond then triangle, square and rectangle. after shape changing for a few minutes, it stopped and multiplied into three objects and proceeded to move around again with the three objects in unison and pattern.  shape change happened again into same shape patterns remaining in unison with movement and type of shape changing. after several more minutes it stopped and absorbed back into one object which kept the triangular shape. it now moved very high up and seemed to disappear from everyones sight except for my mothers. for the next 30 seconds she was the only one who could see the object. it then disappeared from her sight and my cousin was now the only one who could see the object.  after about 30 seconds it completely disappeared from his sight and never reappeared.
this event has to be the only thing that my father or my brother and i have not been able to scientifically explain or dismiss. i myself have suffered no effects psychologicaly or otherwise and neither has anyone who witnessed the object except for my cousin.  several years after the event he denied ever seeing or being present when it happened and still denies it to this day.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Thought to be a kite unusually high up. then moved fast and far. changed shapes and multiplied

content.detailedDescription:
I was a student at the university of maryland and was walking back to my dormitory, easton hall, after working at the library.  the library closed at 10:00 p.M., so i estimate the time to be between 10:15 and 10:30.  as i entered the dorm complex quadrangle between denton hall and elkton hall and continued to walk toward easton hall i began to hear a commotion coming from some of the open windows in easton.  the voices were excited about something and guys were pointing at something up in the air above my head. i first looked up and saw nothing.  i then turned around and immediately saw a cluster of bluish-white orbs hovering in a geometic formation over the enclosed end of byrd stadium.  i had a clear view between elkton hall and denton hall since i had just entered the complex quadrangle.  
  the main grouping of orbs remained stationary, but from time to time a single orb would move out and away from the group, stop and hover there for briefly and then swiftly return to its place in the formation.  then another orb would move out in another direction and hover briefly then return to its position just as the previous one had done. this activity continued for approximately 60 to 90 seconds.  then the entire formation suddenly took off and moved swiftly and silently off to my left over the trees in the direction of the cambridge dorm complex.  
i was understandably shaken and excited.  i ran the rest of the way back to my dorm floor, which was below grade on the front side of the building and had no windows facing in that direction.  i told my friends what i had seen and, of course, they laughed and accused me of having been out drinking and had a lot of fun at my expense.  
the next day there were articles in both the campus newspaper, the diamondback, and the washington post about the sightings reported by dozens of people and said andrews air force base had scrambled a few jets to investigate the incident.  a few days later the papers printed a followup article saying that the source of the sightings had been "swamp gas".
   unfortunately the articles, which i had saved, were lost in the months following the incident and i've not been able to track down the evidence or pinpoint the time frame when it occurred. the event date i entered above is just a wild guess. any assistance you could give me in tracking down some documentation of this incident would be greatly appreciated. 

                                 thank you,
                               (name and phone number moved to fi field) cms 09/08/11 07:12 fgl
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Walking toward dormitory and heard comotion coming from dorm windows.  i turned around and observed a cluster of glowing orbs hovering over the football stadium.

content.detailedDescription: This is actually the first sighting i had. it took place near my home in socastee, south carolina. i was about ten or eleven years old. we lived out in the country and spent every spare moment in the woods or the river. my dad was stationed at myrtle beach a.F. base. it was summer and there was a group of kids we hung out with, hunted,fished, the whole huck finn thing. one day after lunch we were headed back out to meet up with the gang, when we heard a high pitched whining noise. we is me and my younger brother. we stopped to search for the source of the noise when the rest of the guys walked up. one of my friends asked what the noise was. i told him i didn't know after searching the sky for several seconds we saw a shiney silver colored cone shaped object (like the capsule of the appolo space program) desending over our heads. as it got closer the sound got louder and the object appeared to be spinning, why i thought this i don't know because the object did not appear to have anything sticking out from it, it was very smooth looking. we all stared at it with our heads leaned back as far as they would go. while we watched it, the object came down to maybe a hundred feet off the groung. i could see the corn field reflected in the bottom of the craft. it hovered for nearly a minute then started moving off towards the tree line, maybe a thousand feet away. there was absolutely no wind from the craft. it asended maybe 500 feet or so then moved off parallel to the ground. it might have moved about several thousand feet then hovered again. then it desended to tree top level and started moving back towards us. it made several direction changes in it's flight path. as it approached us the second time we started running towards my house, about a quarter mile away. the object then made a 45 degree turn and flew off towards the town of conway. we stopped running as the sound got softer and started watching it again. it was then that two a-7 corsairs out of myrtle beach air force base showed up at tree top level and in the blink of an eye the object shot straight up and out of sight. we ran home to tell my parents. when we got there we told my mother what we saw. she confirmed that she had heard the sound but she thought it was my father working with a drill. when we told my father, he said it was not him. then he called a friend of his who was on duty at the base. they spoke for several minutes then hung up. he never would tell us what they talked about. but he never tried to explain what we might have seen. to this day the whole incident remains fresh in my mind.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I believe

content.detailedDescription: I tppk a pic of an orb like object in the sky around 5 pm, it was just below what looked like a chemtrail it.Was there one minute and then just disapeared, i have a pic of it on my phone.
content.summary: I was taking a pic of a chem trail when i noticed an orb like object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on highway 41 heading home after i got off work, but just before i reached the john deere store, i noticed a red pulsating light to my southwest, about my 2:30 position, and about 20 degrees above the horizon heading due south parallel to the highway. i forgot to bring my camera so i drew a quick sketch of the lights. as i looked closely at it, i could see that there were two red lights, one on the front and one on the back. the front light remained constant, but the one behind it was pulsating about twice per second. the lights made an abrupt turn toward the south-southwest and picked up speed (roughly 150 to 200 mph). i followed them for about four miles before i turned west onto our road and pulled over to watch the lights. i rolled down the drivers side window and shut off the engine to listen for any noise that they might have been emmiting, but i did not hear anything, other than moderately loud traffic noise behind me on highway 41. i started up the engine about 10 seconds later and decided to make my way home, but made sure to keep my eyes on it. when pulled into our driveway i got out and watched the the lights finally disappear behind the trees on the horizon to my south-southwest. this occured from 9:32 pm edt to 9:39 pm edt. this is the second ufo that i have witnessed in about a week now, and i am beginning to wonder if another ufo outbreak is about to unfold, i am going to make sure to have my camera ready everytime i step outside of the house.
content.summary: 2 red lights, one pulsating and the other unwavering

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting,, tuesday 8-30-2011.....,definately a ufo..Very close....Approx 500 to 1000 feet...Hovering then slowly moved..Then stopped..No noise....Pulsating light of red, yellow and orange...Shaped like a cube. watched it for 10 minutes then it started to move away again and suddenly disappeared.Definitely not a balloon, airplane, flare, helicopter, planet, meteor etc.  time:: 10:15 pm....Intersection of lampson rd and route 48....Lysander. ny.  clear sky...No wind.....78 degrees. 

 observed by myself and daughter .....We were headed north on route 48 after leaving the new york state fair.  we saw it first while in motion and pulled over at intersection, got out of the car and walked into a field and and observed it for approximately 10 minutes. tried taking pics with a cell phone camera but they didn't pick up enough light.

the above was summiteed by stephen cox, chief field investigator ny mufon
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighting,, very close....Approx 500 to 1000 feet

content.summary: Took pictures of utility pole and noticed circle object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
>> september 6, 2011 >> about 9:15ish pm.... >> standing on 2nd story patio in an apt building in springfield facing north northwest ....Watching stars n enjoying evening. from over my left shoulder...And not very high at all...Was a huge ship of some sort..It had no lights on it..It was so close even in the evening i could see quite well that it was a brown or reddish color. it made no sound and scared the wits out of me that this huge ship was suddenly right there and so close and so huge. it was almost oval/rectangular in shape...I say both because it was like the corners were rounded off a bit. it wasn't going too fast at all...It was headed the in the northwest in the direction of the pacific from behind me. it was dark out, but i'm in the city of springfield, oregon and its pretty bright here in the apts i live in&the hotel sign that's shines for the freeway makes it bright. this huge ship was low enough that it must have just flown right over that sign to go over my head that low. i didn't know how to get mufon to work for my mobile, & i wanted to contact someone because i'm sure i'm not the only one to see this thing...I'm right off the freeway!!! like i said brownish or maybe a red brown in color and was giant. i would venture to guess maybe a football fields size, give or take. i have always been scared of reporting this type of thing in the past, but with the mere size of this thing and its closeness to the freeway and hotel and how low it was, i can only hope someone else will report it too.
>> again..This happened september 6,2011 @ approximately 9:15pm in springfield, oregon and it was going northwest.
content.summary: Came over my patio from behind me going towards nw..Was extremely large with no lights on.

content.detailedDescription:
Here's what happened:
 
1.  at 530am on wednesday, september 7, 2011, i was outside on our patio, having a cigarette while the dogs were out in the backyard doing their morning business (you know what i mean).  i happened to look up over the trees next door (as seen in the photograph), and noticed a bright, sparkling light hovering in the sky, directly to the sw of my position.
 
2.  at first, i thought it was a bright star, or possibly a planet, since the dawn was breaking, and most of the stars had vanished, save for venus and one other.  however, the brightness & sparkling was really quite noticeable.
 
3.  i then thought that the object was an airplane;  living so close to chicago, it's not uncommon to see aircraft at all distances, and i wondered if this was the same thing, but wondered why it seemed to hover in the air.  i then thought, well, maybe it's flying towards me, and thus is only appearing to remain motionless.
 
4.  then, quite suddenly, a second object appeared, directly over the first one, shaped vertically, almost like a sail, or an uplifted rudder.  i honestly was very puzzled, and thought i was seeing things.  the second object also disappeared rather quickly.
 
5.  i then realised that the object was rising, very, very slowly, through the air, up and to (my) right.  it seemed to climb for a few seconds, then levelled off, and came back down!  it took a long time to do so as well.  i really got the impression that it was having difficulties, and, for some reason, also thought that it was an airplane being re-fueled in mid-air...I'm still not sure why.
 
6.  at periodic intervals, the second object would appear, always on top, and always vertically aligned.  it was really most puzzling.  i had the strangest impression that it was reflecting light from the (not yet risen) sun, as it seemed to catch the glow from the east in that manner.  but, again, it would always disappear after a few seconds.
 
7.  i ran inside for my camera, and took several shots.  i tried to capture the second object, but, alas, did not do so.  i do have several images, one of which is attached to this email, highlighted with a red circle.  the trees are approximately 50-60 ft tall, and about the same dimension away, in my neighbour's yard.
 
8.  the object remained in view from 530am until 6am, when i left for the gym;  however, i lost sight of it as i drove away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: A sparkling, bright object that hoevered and then a second object that appeared above it.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at a friends house with night vision to search for ufo's after a friend said he had seen one about 2 weeks prior, a massive white orb dropped from the sky, and slowed at just above tree top level, and appeared to land in a forrest about 2 miles from where he lives. 

at about 11pm i gave up looking and was putting my gear away, when my wife shouted quick look. i turned but it was too late i had missed it. she said she had seen the biggest ufo she had ever seen  a little bigger than the size of a good full moon. but this was only about a mile away, at tree top hight. she said it was massive, it passed behind the trees, from left to right as was a very bight white light with glowing green ora about it. as it was si low, it dissapeared before i could see it. bugger!! 

from her description, it was travelling in the same type of direction this other guy said he saw one a couple of weeks prior. i wonder if it's a regular landing area for them, very unpopulated and is dense forest and a small lake in this area.
content.summary: Massive large orb very bright white light glowing green aora

content.detailedDescription: I was shooting basketball hoops in upper hay mow of barn,the lower mow was across an open area appx 20 ft away.It was dusk getting darker and i could make out the outside sky thru acouple of small cracks in the old barn siding.I had taken a shot at the basket and had walked to my left appx 10ft to retrieve the basketball when something across the other mow caught my attention.I can only describe it as a tremendos amount of concentrated energy. at that moment i could visibly see nothing but i new something was there.As i continued looking at that spot a ball of pulsating light appeared.I would say it was abought the size of a softball or maybe a little larger.My mind was trying to figure out what i was looking at.I stepped to my right a couple of steps and relized i could see behind this object and that it was just sitting in thr air pulsating.As i watched this object and my mind was scrambling trying to find an explanation, it expanded vertically and i found myself facing a being with very large black eyes, a tiny nose,a slit for a mouth,very small flat ears and long fingers.I would say its height was less than 4ft.It appeared to be very light complected.It scared the hell out of me and i could feel some kind of energy hitting me in the lower forehead as if it was trying to communicate or observe me,i was aware it was moving closer and i ran ! i told my family i had seen a ghost ,i did not know how else to explaine it.A short time later my mother and i were in the car driving when we drove up on a orange ball of light sitting in the air ,when we got close to it it just disappeared we did not know what it was.About two years after my first encounter and in the same place i had a huge triangular shapped vehicle stop over my head.It was black in color and made no sound at all.It had 3 huge round lights, 1 on each corner with a panel of white lights across the rear.This ship was easily 400ft long .It sat above me for at least 10 minutes.I dont believe it could have been more than a couple hundred feet off the ground.When this craft started to move the large corner lights went to blue , green, and red.The rear lights flipped on in sequence left to right.It moved away in a very slow ne direction,no sound or air movment. i swear these events happened and i would not hesitate to take a lie detecter test.
content.summary: Apprached by being appx 4ft tall large black eyes slit for mouth very small nose tiny flat ears very long fingers three on each hand

content.detailedDescription:
Youtubers are finding ufos holographing planes didn't believe it until last night. i live on the flight path of ohare so i see planes going by my living room window witch faces east. what catches my eyes is that some lights are extra bright so i try and take pictures. last night there was a extra bright light so i grabbed my digital camera, it's set on night so shutter stays open longer and i get a trail of lights.
when i reviewed the pictures i was surprised to see that one of the lights had crossed over so it can't be a plane that would be totally impossible.
i also happen to catch something flashing by
content.summary: Thought it was a plane

content.detailedDescription:
Hot, steamy and humid day on saturday afternoon with almost no breeze.  enjoying the coolness of the water on the allegheny river near cheswick/oakmont/harmar by floating with life vest in the calm part of the river -- as many others do who come and throw anchor on a hot summer day.

i was in the water for about 20 minutes swimming around while my partner was in a kayak and leaned back to relax.  i noticed what appeared to be a far away jet at high altitude (about 1/3 inch at arm's length), but i saw only a dash of white and no wings/tail or contrail - which i would expect to see on such a humid day.  well, i thought, perhaps the sun wasn't shining on it at correct angle to see structures besides a tube or cigar shape, which would be not out of the question at such altitude (if high).  so i watched it fly straight path slowly into a puffy cloud (or above it, not sure of height of cloud or altitude of object).  i decided to keep watching for it to exit the cloud which was about 8 inches long at arm's length. i mentioned this to my partner who saw it as well, but was too interested in the goings-on on the water to be interested and proceeded to paddle off to get some refreshments.

at the estimated speed it was traveling, it should have come out the other side within 3-4 minutes tops.  it didn't.  so i waited, not taking my eyes off it.  after an amazing 12 to 15 minutes or so (enough for at least 4 or so songs on boat radios to have played) it surprised me by emerging, continuing slowly in straight line to the next cloud over about 1 foot at arm's length away.  "well okay then, perhaps you aren't a jet after all," i thought.

so i watched that cloud too to see if it would repeat the hide-in-cloud behavior.
it didn't.
it never came out that second cloud even though i watched until that cloud dispersed into nothingness.

the area it was over is by the pa turnpike and route 28 interchanges and not far from 2 cheswick coal-fired power plants on the river.  i thought it pertinent to report this since i've seen other recent pa ufo reports that seem to be located not to far from or near the pa turnpike as well.

recording it obviously wasn't an option since i was in the water far from shore the whole time.  you would get more reports if "anonymous" truly meant not having to give you any personal information.  i do not wish to be contacted.  i report this only for other eye witnesses who might have seen these too, because i know you can't study such a sighting.
content.summary: Daytime cigar-shaped object went into cloud & took 12+ minutes to exit

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on by balcony and smoking a cigarette.
when i was finished, i just wanted to look at some clouds, and there it was.
since i have been watching the sky over vienna the whole summer, and have seen nearly everyday at around 21:15h "strange lights" that where flying with enormous speed, and suddenly stopping, and accelerating after 4-5 minutes to highspeed, my first thought was that it could be an ufo.

this object was just hovering there for like 10 minutes, and after a big cloud moved over it for some seconds, it was gone.

when i noticed it, i ran into my room, told my girlfriend what i saw, took her "cannon eos 500d", ran back with her to the balcony, and took one snap of it, and we where seeing it both of us, i felt how my heart started beating faster and felt some strange things.

i also took some photos of the airplanes in the area for comprehension, and none
content.summary: A star-like object was hovering for around 10 minutes in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: About 9:19pm while driving to work i notice 4 or 5 bright yellow/organge orbs in the sky. i pulled over to see if i could get a photo. but they flickered out before i could. i then perceded on my way spotting only a few of them closer to town. again flickering out quickly. only a mile or so to work i looked up again and notice this time about 5 star like light blinking really rapidly. they were not in a specific formation or as best i could tell. i was so amped up at the sighting that i tried to call my friend. though it took about 5 minutes to get through since it kept saying no network. which is strange since i always get a signal. finally, i got through to my friend and told her. though while telling her it hurt my head. then faded back to normal. later that night i went on break and had another strange sighting this time it was a blue orb that shot across the sky. it looked similar to a shooting star only it was huge. i only wish that the people i was on break seen it to. needless to say it was an eventfull night.
content.summary: Multiple ufo sightings on way to work.

content.detailedDescription: We saw an low flying orb of white making no noise at all a plane passed over the top of it leaving from d.I.A as it flew over the top of the house it diminished to a small red light then it was just gone
content.summary: Myself and three others saw an orb of low flying slow flying light that flew over the house turned into a small red light then disappeared no noise at all

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my dogs out in my backyard when i happened to look off to the east in the sky and suddenly noticed a line of 5 bright lights that appeared to be connected as one large object that was turning in the sky. i ran back inside to tell my father what i was seeing and by the time i got back out, which was 5-10 seconds tops the object was gone. 

i stayed out looking with him for another 10 or so minutes when we heard a very loud plane which came into view heading northwest towards possibly the direction of columbia city/wherever at a high speed, another did the same a few minutes later, both were very, very low flying and going in the opposite direction of the local afb (air force base). during this time we also noticed 2 very high flying planes going in a counter and alternatively clockwise circle over the area where i had seen the craft.

note i saw a very similar object like this back in 2006 that did the exact same thing, one moment it was there the next it took off at an extreme rate of speed, which i assume this one did too.
content.summary: Saw a line of 5 very bright lights in sky, appeared solid

content.detailedDescription:
I attended a family reunion at windy hill dunes,a north myrtle beach condominium in north carolina in a complex between 48th avenue south and 33rd avenue south from august 6, 2010 to august 13, 2010. on the night of august 10th, some of us gathered on a fifth floor terrace overlooking the ocean at approximately 10:00 p.M. there were periodic fireworks displays to our right on the shoreline that appeared to be 2 to 3 miles away.
at approximately 10:20 p.M. a single glowing reddish-orange object appeared over the ocean directly opposite our vantage point at about 20 to 30 degrees above the surface of the water. it did not move for at least two minutes; it appeared to hover over the ocean in the same position before it faded out. less than 5 minutes later, two of these glowing reddish-orange balls appeared in a slightly different location...A bit to the right this time and at an increased elevation of perhaps 35 degrees. soon these objects faded out. finally, within another ten minutes three of these same objects appeared in a sideways vee formation at about 25 to 35 degrees. they remained in that position for a good two or three minutes and then faded out. throughout our observation time, we did not see them move at all. they just appeared and then eventually blinked out. 
they were not fireworks, as the pyrotechnic displays were too far away. there was no sound, and the objects were all uniform in size and color...Reddish-orange with rough edges and plasma-like pulsation. three of us saw the strange lights and agreed that they were definitely ufos. by the time i retrieved my camera to try to capture a photo or two, the lights did not return. we speculated that the objects were attracted to the fireworks displays further down the beach. at one point not long after the three objects disappeared,my wife carol and i noticed two silvery cylindrical craft streaking overhead at a very high elevation and with great speed. we do not know if these objects were related to our initial sighting.
content.summary: We witnessed from one to three reddish-orange objects over the ocean from our beachfront apartment. they would appear for awhile in a fixed position and then disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I called cliff today and talked to him about what my son and i saw, and he asked me to email to let you know. we live in fort collins colorado.  on sept 4th 2011 at about 9:00 pm i went outside to wait for my son whom i had told to come out to "have a talk". walking around in my backyard, a light in the sky caught my eye.  through a tree i saw a large orange light and since it wasn't moving in the sky i thought it was a helicopter flying toward our house.  i went to the outer garage door of the house to get my son to look at it as my son was coming out of the house.  i told him to hurry over so we could watch it.  (it's still cool for my 10 year old to watch planes and helicopters fly over). when we got to a spot where we had a clear view of the sky we saw not one, but 6 or 7 of the same lights in the sky. my son got nervous right away and asked me what it was.  as i told him it was probably helicopters and we should hear something soon (which we never did). the lights on the outside of the line quickly moved left and right respectively.  at the same time working into the middle, the other lights also moved in different directions and out of site.   as i was telling my son that they could still be helicopters the last light appeared to go straight up/back, and within about 4 or 5 seconds it was gone.  the lights were at first about as big as making a circle with you fingers about the size of a pea, and holding your arms out at arms length.  the color was an orange color and they were just "shining".  not the pulsating thing i have since read about online.  i don't have a clue on how far away these things were, but even at close range the speed in which they left is something i have never seen.  i'm not a big believer in ufo's but i now have a new appreciation for the conversation.  i hope all of this helps you all to find the answer.  i know my son would appreciate it.
content.summary: Six or seven large orange lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: At aprox 8:45pm as i biked over to the temple burn i looked back towards the campgrounds and saw a red light moving slowly from 12'oclock to 3 o'clock, i noticed it was dropping red orbs, i thought it might be a helicopter but it was shining bright red and there were definately no pulsating flight lights.  i watched as it slowly flew over the entire campground and eventually it took position right above the temple where every one was gathering, i pointed up to it with a laser and everyone around me saw the object pulse back.  a lot of people saw this and a lot took video as well.  it droped an orb right behind the temple and slowly moved away, then it hovered still for at least 5-8 minutes until eventually it just disintegrated or powered out at super fast speed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Burning man red ufo dropping orbs
